name: ListScimEnterpriseMembers
description:
Lists provisioned SCIM enterprise members for GitHub enterprises.

This tool retrieves a list of provisioned SCIM enterprise members associated with a GitHub enterprise account. It is useful for managing enterprise users and understanding membership status. The tool allows you to exclude certain attributes to improve query performance.

parameters.name: filter_criteria
parameters.description: Filter results by `userName`, `externalId`, `id`, or `displayName`. Only one filter is supported. E.g., "externalId eq '9138790-10932-109120392-12321'".

value_schema.description: If specified, only results that match the specified filter will be returned. Multiple filters are not supported. Possible filters are `userName`, `externalId`, `id`, and `displayName`. For example, `?filter="externalId eq '9138790-10932-109120392-12321'"`.

parameters.name: exclude_attributes
parameters.description: Specify attributes to exclude from the results to improve query performance. Commonly used values are 'groups'.

value_schema.description: Excludes the specified attribute from being returned in the results. Using this parameter can speed up response time.

parameters.name: pagination_start_index
parameters.description: The starting index of the first result to return for paginated responses.

value_schema.description: Used for pagination: the starting index of the first result to return when paginating through values.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of SCIM enterprise members to return per page for pagination.

value_schema.description: Used for pagination: the number of results to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.
